snippet: Henry Bunsow, a former partner at the bankrupt Dewey & LeBoeuf, is suing the firm's management team and several partners, claiming they misrepresented the financials and pushed partners to make capital investments.
abstract: Henry Bunsow, a former partner at the bankrupt Dewey & LeBoeuf, is suing the firm's management team and several partners, claiming they misrepresented the financials and pushed partners to make capital investments.

headline.main: Former Dewey & LeBoeuf Partner Sues Firm's Management
